### Instructor
  
**Professor Emilio M. Bruna (he/him)**  
Department of Wildlife Ecology & Conservation and  
Center For Latin American Studies. 

### Office Hours

* **When**: Wednesday or Friday 10:30 am - 12 noon. If you can't make one of these sessions let me know and we will make an appointment 
* **Format**: In person (location below) or via Zoom (link on class canvas page). If come to the lab you get free tea or coffee. Good stuff, usually 4-5 kinds. And we have an espresso machine. Just sayin'.
* **Signup**: You can [sign up for an Office Hours appointment here](http://brunalab.org/teaching/office-hours/). You don't have to sign up for a specific time - you're welcome to just show up anytime during the schedule office hours. However, by signing up you can guarantee a specific time slot and avoid waiting in line. 
* **Location**: Tropical Ecology & Conservation Lab, 711 Newell Dr. [map and directions](http://brunalab.org/contact-find-us/)
